title: AI Technician Program
subtitle: The AI Technician Program is a 36-month immersive learning experience that includes foundational training in cloud infrastructure, Python programming, and data engineering, followed by two years of hands-on, project-based work in applied AI environments.

title: AI Scholars Program
subtitle: The AI Scholars Program offers advanced academic opportunities through 22-month master's and 36-month doctoral tracks. Participants specialize in areas such as data analytics, data engineering, and autonomous systems, with follow-on roles supporting enterprise innovation initiatives.

title: Data Driven Leaders Course
subtitle: The DDL Course is a weeklong, in-person executive education program that covers key topics such as data science, decision-making, technology adoption, change management, and data privacy. It is designed for leaders seeking to drive innovation through data-informed strategies.
